text: walnsa' almtlqat allaati ainqatae enhnn dam alhyd; lkbr snhnnØŒ 'iina shkktm falam tdru ma alhukm fyhnna? feddathnn thalathat ashhr, walsghyrat allaati lm yhdn, faeidatuhuna thalathat 'ashhur kdhlk. wdhwat alhaml min alnisa' edthn 'an yadaen hamlhn. wamin yakhaf allh, fynfdh ahkamh, yajeal lah min 'amrih ysrana fi aldunya walakhrt
